definition: Myanmar (formerly Burma) (abbr. for 緬甸|缅甸[Mian3 dian4])
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to commemorate/to recall fondly/to think of the past
(bird species of China) Indian spot-billed duck (Anas poecilorhyncha)
(bird species of China) manipur fulvetta (Fulvetta manipurensis)
pinyin: yin4 mian3 he4 tou2 que4 mei2

definition: Union of Myanmar, official name of Burma 1998-2010

sentences.english: Of the tribe of Simeon, Shaphat the son of Hori.
sentences.chinese: 属西缅支派的有何利的儿子的沙法。

sentences.english: Today, many Burmese view China as a pillager of resources.
sentences.chinese: 如今，许多缅族人都把中国看做是一个资源掠夺者。

sentences.english: And feel that my mother now thinks of her child.
sentences.chinese: 便想起母亲正缅想着她的孩子。

sentences.english: Shemuel son of Ammihud, from the tribe of Simeon;
sentences.chinese: 西缅支派有亚米忽的儿子示母利。

sentences.english: Yearning for a long enrapture you yesterday and the longing for a beautiful future.
sentences.chinese: 思念是对你昨日悠长的沉缅和对未来美好的向往。

sentences.english: Hu Jintao said that the people of China and Myanmar have enjoyed long-standing friendship.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，中缅两国人民的友谊源远流长。

sentences.english: Of the tribe of Simeon， Shaphat the son of Hori.
sentences.chinese: 属西缅支派的有何利的儿子的沙法。

sentences.english: After what happened, China and Myanmar have kept close communication.
sentences.chinese: 事态发生以后，中缅双方保持着密切沟通。

sentences.english: Against this backdrop, it is highly necessary to enhance exchanges between leaders of the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 在这一背影下，加强中缅领导人的相互交往十分必要。

sentences.english: The second lot came out for the tribe of Simeon, clan by clan.
sentences.chinese: 为西缅支派的人，按着宗族，拈出第二阄。

sentences.english: She will travel to the Thai-Burmese border to visit a refugee center, and a clinic.
sentences.chinese: 她将前往泰缅边界，参观一个难民营和一个诊所。

sentences.english: Of Simeon; Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
sentences.chinese: 西缅的，有苏利沙代的儿子示路蔑。

sentences.english: And by the border of Benjamin, from the east side unto the west side, Simeon shall have a portion.
sentences.chinese: 挨着便雅悯的地界，从东到西，是西缅的一分。

sentences.english: This was the inheritance of the tribe of the Simeonites, clan by clan.
sentences.chinese: 这是西缅支派按着宗族所得的地业。

sentences.english: I probably know him by sight but not by name.
sentences.chinese: 莪概见缅认识咃，卟㳡訆卟丄姓佲。

sentences.english: Operation ICHIGO provoked a major crisis in the China-Burma-India theater.
sentences.chinese: 一号作战是中印缅战区遭遇的一个重大危机。

definition: abbr. for 柬埔寨[Jian3 pu3 zhai4], Cambodia
abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南|云南[Yun2 nan2] in southwest China
Yangon (Rangoon), city, capital of Myanmar from 1948 to 2006
Hungary/Hungarian/abbr. for 匈牙利[Xiong1 ya2 li4]
Mandalay, province and second city of Myanmar (Burma)
Aung San (1915-1947), Burmese general and politician, hero of Myanmar independence movement and father of Aung San Su Kyi 昂山素季[Ang2 Shan1 Su4 Ji4]
Aung San Suu Kyi (1945-), Myanmar opposition leader and 1991 Nobel Peace laureate/also written 昂山素姬
Wa, Kawa or Va ethnic group of Myanmar, south China and southeast Asia
Joseph Stilwell (1883-1946), commander of US forces in China, Burma and India in World War II
people living on the frontiers/inhabitants of a border area
